value.incident_details: Racist remarks made while she was shopping by onlookers.
Racist remarks at student from Manipur
Racist remarks at young professional from Mizoram in the market place
Racist remarks, paan spitting at student from Manipur
Racist remarks from neighbours endured by two women. Two men who came in aid also assaulted on racist grounds.
Racist remarks by neighbour, forcefully evicted from apartment by landlord.
Racist remarks, shopkeeper accused Naga students of not being Indians. Asked for IDs.
Racist remarks chanted at school at at 7 year old
Racist remarks on two different instances.
Three local women spread rumours via WhatsApp that “Muslims were spreading the coronavirus by shaking hands”.
3-4 men insulted imam on grounds of religion.
Biker forcefully took of her mask and spat on her when she was out to get groceries with her sister
Racist remarks by healthcare workers and other patients
Racist remarks at group of students from Nagaland in the public.
The Gujjar milk sellers boycotted by locals for alleged relation to TJ

value.incident: Preventing azaan in mosques; meatshops from running
value.incident_details: Mosques not allowed to play azaan and meat shops, primarily run by Muslims, shut down.
Muslims boys randomly arrested in North East Delhi, family extorted for money by the police.
Several DU teachers posted hate speech about Muslims on their social medias, asking for them to be put in gas chambers, etc.
Afzalpur Police on Saturday booked two people for allegedly posting provocative and fake content message on social media against Muslims
Water supply tap in the area has been cordoned off by Hindus
Rumours about workers returning from Tablighi Jamaat spread; nearly causing a violent situation. Incident diffused.

value.incident: State led hate speech, fake news
value.incident_details: BJP MLA spread fake news about TJ participants misbehaving witht he hospital staff and asked to have them booked under the NSA or shot by the government
After Begusarai became a Corona hotspot
Shopkeepers, banks and distributors of water refuse to provide services to Muslims after Corona breakout.
Fieldworkers denied work on religious grounds and accused of "having corona virus".
Posting fake audio message to target minorities

value.incident: State led hate speech, fake news
value.incident_details: Called TJ Corona Terrorism
Local Muslim doctor's family falsely accused of having Corona by Hindu man, faces community persecution.

value.incident: State led hate speech, fake news
value.incident_details: Minority Affairs Minister called Tablighi Jamaat gathering "a Talibani Crime".
Mosque attacked and burned partially by a large mob, when 2-3 were inside

value.incident: Police released a list of 19 Muslims with COVID-19 allegations, who were untested
value.incident_details: Sahranpur police released a list of 19 Muslim individuals, claiming they have Coronavirus. However, individuals have not bene tested at all.

value.incident: Hospital refused to admit pregnant mother, infant died
value.incident_details: Pregnant Muslim woman turned away from hospital on grounds of religion. Infant died due to birth complications. Case Outcome added on 27 May 2020: https://m.thewire.in/article/communalism/rajasthan-muslim-pregnant-woman-tablighi-jamaat
Muslim volunteers providing aid on two separate occasions in the same locality were called 'terrorists from Nizammudin' by mob of 25; threatened on first day, beaten up with bats on the second.
Three men claimed to police that a Muslim shopkeeper bit and spit at them to spread Corona. Allegation proved false in police report.
Spreading video in which claim was made that a person from a minority community has landed in Peeli Mandori village to spread coronavirus
Video of a group planning to stop Muslims sellers from entering the colony. AADHAAR used to check religion.
Tested negative for the virus after returning from Tablighi Jamaat, but was still boycotted in HP. Suicide over social isolation.
At least (some sources say several) Muslim truckers beaten up by mob, trucks damaged. Forced to flee to Assam.
Muslim youth and his family was threatened and attacked when he was recording a procession of men flashing lights outside at 9PM on 5th April from his balcony.
Gunshots fired near a mosque based on perceptions of Markaz devotees taking shelter inside
Communal posters put up on NH66, disallowing Muslim traders from entering.
Two mosques not participating in switching off lights were attacked by mobs.
Families chased out of homes, forced into starvation and hiding.
Pharmacist refused to sell medicines to 80 year old woman on communal grounds.

value.incident: Physical assault for not lighting lamps
value.incident_details: Four Muslim men attacked and sustained head injuries by Hindu neighbours for not turning off their lights and not "respecting PM Modi's appeal".

value.incident: Denying entry to Muslim milk sellers
value.incident_details: Muslim milksellers abused and chased away by locals who said 'sick Muslims spreading virus'
Upper castes barged into lower-caste residents' home and attacked them and vandalized their home accusing them of not turning off the lights on 5th April.
Muslim volunteers providing aid on two separate occasions in the same locality were called 'terrorists from Nizammudin' by mob of 25; threatened on first day, beaten up with bats on the second.

Muslim youth assaulted on return from Tablighi conference in Bhopal. Had to hide to return. Accused of injecting infected spit in fruits by mob. Was found to not have the virus. Although assailants were booked for attack, but the Muslim youth was also booked under Sec 188.
Accompanied the other youth. Both assaulted on returning to their homes.
Muslim vendors forced to reveal identity and forced to pack up their shops by mobs
Three Muslim men were heckled and attacked by a mob of 15 men accussing them of spreading "the disease".
Star of Mysore reffered to muslims as "rotten apples" and called to "get rid of them". Issued public apology

SPO was strangeled with a rope with the intent of killing him, saying he spread covid, insulted using caste slurs, put in a water chamber by multiple people. had to be put on ventilator. Police booked 7 suspects.
Security guard falsely accused of passing on Corona by residents.
BJP MP posted fake news about people having attended TJ and spitting and misbehaving with the hospital staff
Accusing a persom belonging to the minority community for getting the infection from other village.
Two Manipuri men denied entry into supermarket. Used AADHAR to prove nationality. Security staff denied entry.

Health Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma revealed identities of all COVID-affected, stating all except one had gone to Tablighi Jamaat. Following this, several Muslims were denied accesses and essential services in Assam.
Tribal youth perceived to be Muslim and thought to be spitting to spread Corona. Attacked by mob, died in hospital

FT in Assam raised money for covid relief but told to exclude Tablighis ("Jihadis") from those being aided from the money. Copy of letter circulated on whatsapp but letter was withdrawn and never sent to the government.
Two other people were also attacked and injured by a rampaging mob. Details somewhar unclear.
Goons barged into a mosque, attacking worshippers.
BJP MLA referred to Tablighi Jamaat gatherers as responsible for COVID, claiming that "it is not wrong to shoot them".
Muslim man stopped while on his scooter and physically and verbally assualted by the police. Left lying on the road for almost an hour. Inquiry launched and officer suspended.
Shia Waqf Board Chairman equates TJ members to Suicide bombers
3 men spread communal hatred by posing to be "Muslims who will spread the virus".
Journalist falsely accused muslim man of hiding Jaamatis. Led to hate speech from others.
Local newspaper falsely accused Muslim man of having covid and delibrately spreading it
Announcements made to not allow muslims to enter village

A delhi man demanded identity from a vegetable vendor and started beating him once he heard his name, threatening him and telling him not to enter the locality again. The man said that the vendor had not been following lockdown guidelines. Police arrested him.

value.incident: Sexual assault, physical assault, hate speech
value.incident_details: Muslim nurse denied entry in her village, attacked while coming home from hospital, kicked and thrased, sexually assaulted. Told to "go back to Pakistan".Her brother in law also thrashed
Hindu Mahasabha leader arrested over communal hate speech in light of Covid-19.
Assamese Tablighi Jamaat took his own life after testing positive for COVID-19 in the hospital.

value.incident: Death due to denial of medical aid
value.incident_details: Muslim man denied dialysis treatment by private hospital despite being a regular and having an appointment. He was asked to bring his own PPE kit for the doctors and did so, still didn't let him in without covid-19 test certificate. High court ordered state gov to investigate the same
Muslim vegetable vendors abused and accused of people members of tablighi & were spreading covid, vegetables sold were returned back to them. gov is inquiring into the matter

value.incident: Physical assault, destruction of private property, abuse, false allegations
value.incident_details: Muslim man's son falsely accused of having gone to TJ and hiding in his house. Mob broke into the house, destroyed car as well as houseware, physically abused man.

value.incident: Medical attention denied on grounds of religion.
value.incident_details: Audio conversation bteween hospital staff and a Muslim woman records that Muslims will not be treated in the hospital.
Vendor refuses to sell to muslim women
Two women faced hate speech and religious slurs by a shopkeeper at a grocery store.
Civil hospital segregated Hindu and Muslim wards, citing this as a government-directed order. The government denied involvement and internal investigation found this was implemented by the hospital.

value.incident: Destruction of public property, hate speech
value.incident_details: Two women smashed doors of shops and houses in a muslim dominated area and made abusive remarks about muslims

value.incident: Physical assault, hate speech, death of fetus
value.incident_details: Pregnant, bleeding Muslim Woman made to clean up blood, beaten with slippers and accused of spreading Coronavirus. Complications led to loss of child.
Muslim sanitization worker accosted and falsely accused of spitting to intentionally spread coronavirus

Cancer Hospital posted an advertisement in a Hindi newspaper asking muslims to get tested for covid before coming to the hospital, saying 4500 rs fine will be charged in emergency. Also called Jains 'miserly' and asked them to donate. Apology towards Jains issued next day. FIR Lodged.
Mob attacked family after circulation of a communal post by one of the members. 51 people booked for the clash.
MLA told people not to buy evegtables from Muslim vendors
Daily wager thrashed by police when he stepped out to buy food. Succumbed to Injuries and died. Police denied involvement.
Farmer stranded, denied help. Later beaten up, accused of "spreading disease".
Elderly man falsely accused of spraying urine over bananas, harassed online and forced to do sit ups despite heart condition.
Man refused to accept groceries after he learned that the delivery man was muslim & verbally assualted him. He was later arrested.
BJP MP posted hate speech on twitter about "virus jihad"
Policeman said there will be no Azaan despite Delhi Police saying there will be no ban

value.incident: Police led & mob violence, verbal abuse, false allegations
value.incident_details: Muslim watermelon vendor falsely accused of spitting on his fruits. Beaten up by police as well as mob. Kheri Police confimred that the allegations against vendor were false and said no policemen were involved in the violence
Fruitseller asked name, then brutally beaten up by mob and refused entry into colony.
Musims denied food rations despite providing white card on religious grounds.
BJP MLA segregated 11 Tablighi Jamaat members first in a mosque, then from the village.
NGO worker forced to leave village over Corona fears.
UP MLA harassed and threatened Muslim vendor
BJP MLA called JNMC hospital, affiliated to AMU, responsible for spreading covid

value.incident: Medical attention denied on grounds of religion.
value.incident_details: A pregnant woman was denied help and entry from a hospital  and had to travel 20km to another hospital that didn't have an ultrasonic machine. Stillborn delivered as a result.

value.incident: Medical attention denied on grounds of religion.
value.incident_details: Hospital denied entry to muslims. Legal notice issued
Muslim vegetable vendor accused of spreading covid and made to do sit ups. Perpetrator arrested.
Poster barring entry of muslim traders put up on village borders. Taken down by police.
12 families forced to convert to Hinduism, including Dilshad Muhamud, who was earlier beaten up on April 4.
Muslim man falsely accused of hugging people and having covid and is lathi charged by police and physically assualted by other bystanders. Police inquiry launched.
Man trashed and accused of being covid carrier
Owner of Jain Bakeries & ConfectioneriesAdvertised -" Made by Jains on orders, No Muslim staffs"

value.incident: Physical Violence, Destruction of private property
value.incident_details: Fight between 2 villages - physical assualt, ransacking of homes, thrasing of villagers. 6 people arrested.

value.incident: Use of bombs, physical assualt, destruction of private property
value.incident_details: 5 people had tested positive recently, and were seen roaming around freely. When a group protested, the clash erupted. Several houses in Telenipara were ransacked, and bombs were hurled. Several vehicles were vandalised, and some shops were set on fire. 36 people arrested, increased patrolling.
Muslims accused of not social distancing in mosque, eventually lead to someone allegedly breaking into the mosque, and eventual communal violence. 2 people injured. 4 arrested & section 144 imposed.
